trans-unit.source: Represents a group of annotations.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup> class represents a collection of annotations.
This class can be used to manipulate annotations relative to each other.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the content alignment of an annotation.

This property is used to align text for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects, and to align a nonscaled image inside an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the content alignment of an annotation.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation anchor may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
`True` if the annotation anchor may be moved, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
`True` if the annotation may be moved, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the points of a polygon annotation may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
`True` if the points of the polygon annotation may be moved, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be resized with a mouse by the end user.
`True` if the annotation may be resized, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be selected with a mouse by the end user.
`True` if the annotation may be selected, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation's text may be edited when the end user double clicks the text.
`True` if the annotation text may be edited, otherwise `false`.
Gets the collection of annotations in the group.
Note that the coordinates of all annotations in the group are relative to the group annotation.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"></xref> object.
Gets the annotation type.
This property is used to get the name of each annotation type, for example.
Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
The annotation type.
Gets or sets the background color of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the background of an annotation.
Gets or sets the background gradient style of an annotation.

Two colors are used to draw the gradient, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background of an annotation.
Gets or sets the hatch style of an annotation background.

Two colors are used to draw the hatching, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background of an annotation.
Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of an annotation.

A secondary color is used with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackGradientStyle%2A> are used.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the background with hatching or gradient fill.
Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which the annotation is clipped.
If a chart area name is specified, the annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of that chart area.
All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped.
To disable chart area clipping, set this property to <xref:System.Double.NaN> or an empty string.
A `string` that represents the name of an existing chart area.
Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
`True` to release both unmanaged and managed resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets the font to use for the text of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object used for the text of an annotation.
Gets or sets the text color for an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the text color of an annotation.
Gets or sets a flag that determines if an annotation is selected.
`True` if the annotation is selected, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
By default, relative chart coordinates are used.
To use axes coordinates, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.

Then either anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.

`True` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height"></xref> of an annotation are always in chart relative coordinates, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the line color of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation line.
Gets or sets the line style of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> value used to draw an annotation line.
Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of the annotation.
An `integer` value defining the width, in pixels, of an annotation line.
Gets or sets the color of the annotation's shadow.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the shadow of an annotation.
Gets or sets the size of the annotation's shadow.
An `integer` value that represents the offset between an annotation and its shadow.
Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.TextStyle"></xref> enumeration value used to draw the text of an annotation.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the annotation is visible.
`True` if the annotation is visible, otherwise `false`.
